stages.name: Bismillah
stages.english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

stages.name: Verse 2
stages.english: All praise is due to Allah, Lord of the worlds

stages.name: Verse 3
stages.english: The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

stages.name: Verse 4
stages.english: Master of the Day of Judgment

stages.name: Verse 5
stages.english: You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help

stages.name: Verse 6
stages.english: Guide us to the straight path

stages.name: Verse 7
stages.arabic: صِرَاطَ الَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ الْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّالِّينَ
stages.english: The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have earned Your anger or of those who have gone astray
stages.transliteration: Sirat al-ladhina an'amta 'alayhim, ghayril-maghdubi 'alayhim wa lad-dalleen
stages.instruction: Specify the path of the righteous
